name: Thelkesha Adventures - Avenkel Insurrection
description:
Thelkesha Adventures is a traditional turn-based RPG that currently takes place in the western-themed town of Avenkel. Fight Varmints, look cute, and most importantly, save the town!

The game currently ends when you talk to the Sheriff after the first Varmint encounter. Good luck!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move.
C to interact or advance dialogue.
Space to jump.
Escape to bring up the menu.

Features:

 - Cute-looking characters with simple animations.

 - Fully functioning dialogue.

 - Working combat system.

- Progressive protagonists. (See below)

The party:

Pronouns: They/Them
Gender at birth: Male
Summary: Dependable leader who helps hold the party together. They are often mistaken for a woman, much to their chagrin.

Pronouns: She/Her
Gender at birth: Female
Summary:  An energetic and sometimes overly enthusiastic rabbit who used to be an archeologist. She sometimes likes to reference vegetables she hates when she's flustered.

Pronouns: Ze/Zir
Gender at birth: Intersex
Summary: A somewhat mysterious fox with magical capabilities. Ze sees the world from a fresh perspective, but ze is sometimes naive.

Tools used:

 - Unity

 - Photoshop

  - Maya

 - Piskel

Known issues:

 -Things that become transparent when the camera is close enough will stop doing so after battling the varmints.

Credits:

All music is from https://www.chosic.com/free-music/  While it's not meant to loop, this music is what makes the current iteration of Thelkesha Adventures possible.  The details can be found below:

Creative Commons CC BY 4.0
